extendedIngredients.name: raspberry jam
extendedIngredients.originalString: ¼ cup seedless red raspberry jam

recipes.title: White Chocolate Red Berry Rice Krispie Treats

winePairing.pairingText: Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port are my top picks for Rice Crispy Treats. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. The NV Johnson Estate Cream Sherry with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 19 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Johnson Estate Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: Very aromatic with notes of hazelnut, vanilla, and a touch of oak followed by sweet raisins and a touch of yeast. Clean lasting finish. Good now but will reward those allow it to age"". A favorite pre-prandial beverage. Consider it with nuts before dinner as an aperitif, or after dinner with dessert, especially chocolates and fruit-based desserts. Also wonderful on cold afternoons, served with biscotti to dip in ""Italian-style"". "

recipes.instructions: In a large pot, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add marshmallows and stir until almost melted.Stir in jam and vanilla extract and continue to stir until mixture is fully blended.Remove pan from heat. Stir in rice krispies, white chocolate and cranberries until evenly coated.Press mixture into a pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray and press down gently but firmly with a spatula or greased hands.Cool completely and cut into 24 squares.

steps.step: In a large pot, melt butter over medium-low heat.
Add marshmallows and stir until almost melted.Stir in jam and vanilla extract and continue to stir until mixture is fully blended.

Remove pan from heat. Stir in rice krispies, white chocolate and cranberries until evenly coated.Press mixture into a pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray and press down gently but firmly with a spatula or greased hands.Cool completely and cut into 24 squares.
